api_list.name: Basic IP Lookup
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-advanced-toolkit.p.rapidapi.com/basic/193.201.9.108/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-advanced-toolkit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-advanced-toolkit.p.rapidapi.com/basic/{valid}/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-advanced-toolkit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Skype Resolver
Cloudfare & Subdomain Scanner
api_list.description:
Deep Subdomain Scanner.
Input must be like : "google.com"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-advanced-toolkit.p.rapidapi.com/subdomain/google.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-advanced-toolkit.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
